name: Harem War
description:
Warrior and charmer has the same goal : to maximize the number of conquests.

And what is more unfair than the snowball effect : the better you are, the better you'll be.

Theme : All is fair in love and war

Harem War is a TPS where you fight with your lovers on snow.
Some lovers fight for you on their own, others can't leave you alone.

Gameplay :
You can use keyboard-mouse or gamepad.
You can play in solo or with friends in local split-screen.

In Conqueror, the winner is the player with the most lovers among all spawned. Lover can't be stolen

In Dominator, the winner is the player which kept his lovers the longest during 2min. Lover can be stolen but it is immune from stealing for 5s (it appears black).

2 Mode, 3 Maps, 3 Population size, you have the choice.

By the way, you can launch a game without human player, you can bet with friends on the winner.

Have fun !

Keys :

Main Menu :
Mouse3 (wheel button) to enter/exit game (start on gamepad)
Wheel up/down to change team (right/left shoulder on gamepad)
Numpad+/Numpad- to add/remove bot (B/X on gamepad)
Numpad* to change team of the last bot (Y on gamepad)

InGame :

WSAD (or Arrow) to move (left stick on gamepad)
Mouse axis to aim (right stick on gamepad)
Mouse 1 to shoot (right trigger on gamepad)

(You move faster when you are not shooting)
